Modul de.hitec.nhplus
Package de.hitec.nhplus.datastorage

Klasse UserDao

java.lang.Object
de.hitec.nhplus.datastorage.DaoImp<User>
de.hitec.nhplus.datastorage.UserDao
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Dao<User>
public class UserDao extends DaoImp<User>
Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for the User entity. Provides database operations for creating, reading, updating and deleting user records.

  • Feldübersicht

    Von Klasse geerbte Felder de.hitec.nhplus.datastorage.DaoImp
